scenario.name: uac_register_quick
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:12345@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:12345@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:12345@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Allow: CANCEL, ACK, INVITE, BYE, OPTIONS, NOTIFY, INFO, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, PRACK, UPDATE, MESSAGE, PUBLISH Contact: <sip:12345@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;expires=3600 Max-Forwards: 30
